channel.title: Hans configuration

item.title: Hans configuration
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

Well, I have made:

		case 1:
            sendOption4("I'm looking for whoever is in charge of this place,",  "I have come to kill everyone in this castle!", "I don't know. I'm lost. Where am I?", "What do you do here?");
            c.dialogueAction = 2;
            c.nextChat = 0;
        break;

and, with option 2, Hans walks one step back and screams “Help! Help!” How do you make NPCS step one step back and yell after a certain dialogue?

Read full topic
